Text: Yahoo Broadcast Services as option for Corporate traveltrainingHello Mr Whalley I would like to introduce myself and my solutions in an extremely difficult time in our nations history The tragedies of September th have caused many corporations to reevaluate their employees business travel The challenge is that your business needs to continue to operate successfully and the need to communicate to your team is even greater Yahoo is facing these same issues With the new challenges of corporate travel Yahoo Broadcast Services can offer you a consistent cost effective high impact engaging alternative to outside meetings Using the strength of the internet Yahoo Broadcast Services can allow employees to participate in a corporate event anywhere anytime Yahoos global network ensures consistent reliable worldwide distribution of your internal communication or message Yahoo can also reach an external audience without staging multiple events in multiple locations With our help Enron can increase internalexternal access to Enron executives without overextending their time Additionally here is a link to some general information regarding webcasting and some case studies that I believe you will find interesting General Information Internal Communications Webcastingincreased our speed to market produced cost efficiencies and vastly reduced travel expenses Jim Kelly Global Risk Management PricewaterhouseCoopers casestudiespwcasp Training Our users are very busy people Ondemand webcasts enable them to get the information they need when they need it Laura Heath Seelig Training Program Manager Texas Instruments casestudiestiasp External Communications Marketing Satisfaction ratings from the online events now exceed our traditional customer seminars Last quarter four of the top five programs were online events Plus many topics we archive attract up to additional participants in over a few months Nancy Neipp Director Event Marketing and Seminars Cisco Systems casestudiesciscoasp I would like to set up a time when Jim Lewandowski and myself can discuss the Yahoo alternatives with you I will call your assistant later this week to set up a meeting Thanks Les Johnson National Account Executive Yahoo Broadcast Services Phone Mobile Fax DO YOU YAHOO There will be a day I promise you when every corporation will view it as routine to communicate with its employees via streaming over the corporate intranet Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer
